name: Quit Horsing Around!
description:
MADE FOR GAME JAMS

  This game was made for two game jams.
  You see, I accidentally joined two game jams at the same time, so I decided to make one game which fits both of these game jams.

CLICHE

One of the rules from the game jams was that the theme had to be a cliche. I went through many lists of cliches and at last I came across "QUIT HORSING AROUND" which gave me a great idea, which also perfectly fits the other criterium.

20 SECONDS

You see, the game has to last 20 seconds, no more, no less. Thats why, the term "Quit horsing around!" fits it very well. The game does repeat and, as a result, it does last longer than 20 seconds (unlike the game developer), each "round" is still 20 seconds long. 


ATTENTION: Please note, that this game was made for game jams in a limited time period, so it might need some quality updates, bug fixes and other kinds of cleaning up. If you do find a bug, please notify me as soon as possible.
